test_results.test_name: Hemoglobin (Hb) Investigation Result Reference Value Unit Primary Sample Type: Blood Hemoglobin (Hb) 12.5 Low 13.5-17.5 g/dL Photometry Comment : Gender Normal Range (g/dL) Male 13.5 - 17.5 Female 12.0 - 15.5 Interpretation : Hemoglon Levels May indicate anemia or blood loss. Further testing may be necessary to determine the underlying cause May indicate conditions such as polycythemia vera, a bone marrow disorder that causes the production of too many red blood cells.
